and t1.order_type = '2'
AND t1.orderid = t2.order_id and t2.adslot_id in ( select t1.id from ssp_devicegroup t,ssp_adslot t1 where t.ssp_app_id = #{ad_app_id} and t.id = t1.ssp_devicegroup_id )

and t2.put_time <= #{edate}
